snap(0,-30,-30)

sky(10,0,80)
fog(17,0,25)
ground(80,0,0)

fadefrom(6000)

name(The Octathlon)

nlaps(1)

set(23,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,2600,0)p
set(10,0,8200,0)p
set(10,0,12400,0)p
set(10,0,16000,180)p
chk(40,0,17600,0)
set(23,0,18400,180)p

set(23,0,24000,0)p
set(10,0,26600,0)p
set(10,0,31000,0)p
chk(40,0,32000,0)
set(33,0,32500,0)pr
set(23,0,33600,180)p
set(24,0,37000,180)
set(24,0,37000,0)

set(23,0,41000,0)p
set(10,0,43600,0)p
set(10,0,49200,0)p

set(32,0,49000,0)pr
set(38,0,51000,0)
fix(41,0,51000,-1300,0)
set(23,0,50600,180)p

set(18,2000,61000,0)p
chk(40,2000,63000,0)
set(18,2000,65000,0)p
set(19,2000,69000,-90)pt

set(19,2000,57000,180)pt
chk(40,2000,63001,0)
chk(40,1,69000,90)
chk(40,-2000,63001,0)
chk(40,1,57000,90)

set(23,0,74000,180)p
set(27,0,75000,0)pr
chk(40,0,75000,0)
set(23,0,74000,0)
set(31,-3500,80000,180)

set(31,0,80000,180)
set(31,1150,80000,180)

set(14,0,175000,-90)pt

maxr(45,4000,-4000)
